items.name: Ginatang Hipon
items.description: Shrimp cooked in coconut milk is undeniably yummy, but it gets better when chili peppers are added.

items.name: Spicy Bicol Express
items.description: It is tender, creamy, and tasty. In addition, it has that good amount of heat that can awaken my taste buds.

items.name: Pakbet with Lechon Kawali
items.description: This involves combining the regular ingredients for pinakbet with crispy chopped lechon kawali.

items.name: Beef Kare Kare
items.description: Beef Kare-Kare is a version of kare-kare or peanut stew that makes use of beef chuck, instead of the traditional oxtail.
